item.title: Catastrophic Goodhart: regularizing RLHF with KL divergence does not mitigate heavy-tailed reward misspecification
item.description: RLHF’s KL regularization fails to prevent ‘catastrophic Goodhart’—policies achieving high proxy reward but low actual utility—when reward errors have heavy tails.
